attributes.action: To stop referring to the terror group as the Islamic State
attributes.background: To stop referring the terror group as the Islamic State as it creates islamophobia and it discriminates against Muslims

rejection.details:
Since 2015 the UK Government has referred to the jihadist group (which styles itself as the Islamic State) as "Daesh".

It is not clear who you are addressing this petition to, or how you would prefer the jihadist group to be referred to.
